name: Love Triangle (Jarrett Ang, SoulBounded)
description:
This game is a submission for the Pizza Jam (Pizza Prize!) by ComputerJames.

The theme chosen is 064 "To Love Oneself" from here

Description:

Follow the journey of a circle who wants to be someone else. Will he fulfill his wish or will he be able to overcome his doubts and accept his flaws?

Controls:

  • Arrow keys / WASD - Player movement
  • Space bar - Jumping (Hold to bunny hop)

Credits:

  • Music  - https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/glass-of-hope/
  • Thunder sounds - http://soundbible.com/1907-Thunder.html
  • Co-developer - https://soulbounded.itch.io/
